document_data.name: Blade Cliffs
document_data.mainbody: The '''Blade Cliffs''' was a chain of dangerous high cliffs on the [[Sword Coast North]], to the southwest from the city of [[Daggerford]] and to the south from the [[Lizard Marsh]].

Description.Flora & Fauna: The coastline had a population of hungry [[seagull]]s and majestic [[osprey]]s that used updrafts to glide over the clifftops. An occasional [[wild boar]] or [[deer]] could be seen dashing through bushes of small delicate grey grapes with wide green leaves not found anywhere else on [[Faerûn]], used to create the famed [[Exeltis Ice Wine]]. The sea caves were home to dangerous [[ochre jellies]].

document_data.History:
[[File:Blade cliffs.png|thumb|''The view of [[Castle Exeltis]] from under the shore cliffs.''|400x400px]]
Castle Exeltis was built on the Blade Cliffs several [[human]] generations before the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], and the lands were used by the family's vineyards. The family became its decline after the scion of the Exeltis family murdered his father and, several years later, tossed his mother off the Blade Cliffs. In the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, Castle Exeltis became besieged by Sir [[Griswald]] and his knights seeking to rescue his kidnapped lover.
document_data.Notable Inhabitants:
*[[Feldran Exeltis]], the murderous noble scion of the Exeltis family in the late 14{{th}} century DR.
*[[Nosfiraat]], a [[vampire]] trapped within the crashed ship, possibly slain in 1372 DR.
*[[Wogbog]], a hungry hermit who lived in a tent not far from the sea ''circa'' 1372 DR.
*[[Xianga]] and [[Beb-Shuur]], two dim-witted members of the so-called [[Order of Theorosophers]] ''circa'' 1372 DR.
